title: gUDu sikkalillA
sahitya:
gUDu sikkalillA gUDina jADu tiLiyalillA


anupallavi

  jODu heNdaruODEhOdaru kODe biddu bayalAyidallA


caraNam 1    eccara goLavillA madadali huccanAdenallA kiccinalli belladaccu biddu tA huccedhOdantAyitallA
    caraNam 2    muppu bandidallA pAyasa tuppavanuNlillA tuppada bindige tippeya mEle toppane biddantAyillA
    caraNam 3    yOgavaLiyidallA mundaNa bhOga tiLiyalillA nAgashayana shrI purandara viTTalana nIgi maredu mana baraDAyidallA
